targets.expr: pve_cpu_usage_ratio{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node", exported_job="$job"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_memory_usage_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} / pve_memory_size_bytes and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_disk_usage_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job", id=~"storage/.+"} / pve_disk_size_bytes * on (id, instance) group_left(storage) pve_storage_info
pve_disk_size_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job", id=~"storage/.+"} * on (id, instance) group_left(storage) pve_storage_info
count by (id) (pve_guest_info{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"})
sum by (status) (pve_guest_info{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"})
sum by (id) (pve_up{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
pve_cpu_usage_limit{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_memory_usage_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_memory_size_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_memory_size_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_cpu_usage_ratio{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_cpu_usage_limit{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_memory_usage_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_memory_size_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} and on(id) pve_node_info
sum by (id, name, type) (pve_guest_info{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"})
sum by (id) (pve_up{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_cpu_usage_limit{exported_site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_size_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)

sum by (id) (pve_memory_usage_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job",template!="1"} / pve_memory_size_bytes and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (id) (pve_disk_size_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_disk_usage_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} / pve_disk_size_bytes and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info{type="lxc"})

((pve_cpu_usage_ratio{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1

(pve_memory_usage_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} / pve_memory_size_bytes * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1

(rate(pve_network_receive_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"}[5m]) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1

(rate(pve_network_transmit_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"}[5m])* on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1

((rate(pve_disk_write_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"}[5m]) + rate(pve_disk_read_bytes[5m])) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1

pve_disk_usage_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} / pve_disk_size_bytes{site="$site", cluster="$cluster", exported_instance="$node",exported_job="$job"} * on (id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info{type="lxc"}
